quotes.text: Each day provides its own gifts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Alexander the Great and his mule driver both died and the same thing happened to both.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: To love only what happens, what was destined. No greater harmony.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: We are often more frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they donâ€™t have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be One.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?
quotes.author: Epictetus
